actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Credit.
Committee on Agriculture requested executive comment from Agriculture Department.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Credit and Rural Electrification

official_title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to change the conditions of eligibility for, and the amount of, financial assistance made with respect to agricultural production losses caused by disaster.

summary.text: Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act regarding the Farmers Home Administration disaster loan program to: (1) lower the minimum loss requirement; (2) eliminate the "area" eligibility test; and (3) increase the percentage of covered losses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to change the conditions of eligibility for, and the amount of, financial assistance made with respect to agricultural production losses caused by disaster.
